However, as a guest I can still access localhost:8080/bin/PhenomeCentral/register 12:50 <sdumitriu> is now known as <sdumitriu_[Away]> 13:08 <mcupak> has quit 13:30 <fabiocba> has quit 13:40 <vishnu93> has joined #phenotips 14:05 <jash4> has quit 14:07 <sdumitriu_[Away]> is now known as <sdumitriu> 14:19 <sdumitriu> has quit 14:26 <sdumitriu> has joined #phenotips 14:31 <akats> the users don 14:31 <akats> t have a pass when they register 14:52 <SayAsh> has quit 15:25 <romanalex> has quit 15:56 <mcupak> has quit 16:23 <sdumitriu1> has joined #phenotips 16:28 <sdumitriu1> has quit 16:29 <sdumitriu1> has joined #phenotips 17:23 <vishnu93> has quit 17:26 <sdumitriu2> has joined #phenotips 17:27 <sdumitriu1> has quit 17:31 <sdumitriu1> has joined #phenotips 17:33 <sdumitriu2> has quit 17:36 <sdumitriu1> has quit 17:44 <gauravsaini03> has quit 17:50 <sdumitriu1> has joined #phenotips 18:14 <akats> "How did you hear about / Who referred you to PhenomeCentral?" and "Why are you requesting access to PhenomeCentral?", are those being merged into XWikiUsers Commet field?
